ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.169"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11309)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11310)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10278), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.16 DYNAMIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] methodCode (CONF:10277), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant {subsets Observation::participant} (CONF:11127)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:11128)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice (CONF:11129)
This playingDevice contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="DEV"
This playingDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11311), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECGType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.19 DYNAMIC (CONF:11312)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.04
This playingDevice contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11309)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11310)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10278), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.16 DYNAMIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] methodCode (CONF:10277), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant {subsets Observation::participant} (CONF:11127)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:11128)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice (CONF:11129)
This playingDevice contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="DEV"
This playingDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11311), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECGType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.19 DYNAMIC (CONF:11312)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.04
This playingDevice contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.169"/> <code code="67519-9" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Cardiac rhythm NEMSIS"/> <text>Text Value</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="2015"/> <high value="2015"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1757906241"/> <methodCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <participant> <participantRole> <playingDevice classCode="DEV" determinerCode="INSTANCE"> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> </playingDevice> </participantRole> </participant> </observation>
